attributes.action: Save us from a Nuclear Holocaust and in turn save yourself! , Save Kashmiri People and help us get India/Pakistan out of this cursed land
attributes.additional_details:
India and Pakistan have fought 4 bloody wars with each other and the first one was fought as early as 1948.

More than 1 million people in India and Pakistan have been killed as a direct result of war/Kashmir imbroglio.

Hundreds of millions of people in both the countries suffer from ills of abject poverty/corruption.

India today is the worlds largest arms buyer.

Animosity has led to the creation of thousands of Jehadi fanatical Islamist elements in Pakistan and Afghanistan whose only aim is to liberate Kashmir and Afghanistan at any cost.

The same animosity has led to the creation/enlistment of hundreds of thousands of Fanatic Hindus in the Indian army (Samjhauta express blast was the handiwork of an Indian army major).

Political parties in India like the BJP, RSS etc which again have a more than 99% fan following in the Indian military/armed forces have Nazi/Fascist ideology.

Surprise me now and tell me that more evidence is needed before you decide to act?
